mapper.insert: INSERT INTO line (name, start_time, end_time, intro, mileage, color, first_opening, url) VALUES (#{name}, #{start_time}, #{end_time}, #{intro}, #{mileage}, #{color}, #{first_opening}, #{url})
mapper.update: UPDATE line SET name = #{name}, start_time = #{start_time}, end_time = #{end_time}, intro = #{intro}, mileage = #{mileage}, color = #{color}, first_opening = #{first_opening}, url = #{url} WHERE name = #{name}
